/>
VIII.iii.10.4.b
.
Referral to the Rating Activity
When all required development is complete and all disability benefits questionnaires (DBQs) are received, including DBQs completed for residual conditions, refer the claim to the rating activity.
References
:Â  For more information on
referring claims to the rating activity after development is complete, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart i, 1.B.1.a
, and
requesting examinations for claims for SC for COVID-19 and residuals, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, 10.5
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
